patterns.pattern: ^\w+ razes (\w+)('s|') magical shield with .+\.$

^\w+ holds .+ quarterstaff aloft, the leaves at your feet drawing upward in summons\. With a flick of the weapon, .+ sends them to swirl about (\w+), the serrated edges drawing tiny cuts in .+ skin as they shred .+ defences\.$
^Flames creep up (\w+)'s magical shield from within, \w+ burning shroud consuming it in an instant\.$
^You touch your tattoo and a massive, translucent hammer rises up and shatters the magical shield surrounding (\w+)\.$
^Your flames consume (\w+)'s shield\.$
^You send .+ to flay (\w+)'s shield defence
^With a casual flick of .+ wrist, \w+ sends a spell of degradation into (\w+)'s Spirit.$
^The meteor slams into (\w+)'s shield, shattering it\.$
You touch your tattoo and summon the hammer but find nothing to strike.
^(\w+)'s shield rapidly dissipates, .+ lust for blood overwhelming it\.$
^You whip .+ through the air in front of (\w+), to no effect.$
^\w+ razes? (\w+)'s magical shield with .+\.$
bone fetish resounds with a chiming echo that shatters (\w+)'s shield.$
^(\w+)'s shielded defence has been stripped.$
^A massive, translucent hammer rises out of .+ tattoo and smashes (\w+)'s magical shield.$
^(\w+)'s shielded defence has been stripped.$
^The protective shield around (\w+) dissipates.$
^With a blinding cut of light, the Cleaver splits (\w+)'s magical shield in two.$
^A thrust from the barbed tail of a vicious wyvern spirit pierces (\w+)'s magical shield.$
^The chaos hound rips (\w+)'s magical shield to shreds\.$
^Saliva drips from the many mouths of the cerberus as its teeth shatter (\w+)'s shield\.$
^You raze (\w+)('s|') magical shield with (.+)\.$
^You use Spirituality Raze \(shield\) on (\w+)\.$
^You lash out with .+ and shatter (\w+)('s|') translucent shield\.$

^You draw your quarterstaff upward as it taps into its stored natural energy, the leaves at your feet heeding your call\. With a flick of the weapon, you send them to scourge (\w+), the serrated edges leaving tiny cuts as they swirl about .+ and shred .+ defences\.$
^You use (Primality Leafstorm) on (\w+)\.$
^You use (Primality Leafstorm Boosted) on (\w+)\.$
^You use Tenacity Devastate on (\w+).$
^You use Tenacity Devastate \(fail\) on (\w+).$
^You touch your tattoo and summon the hammer but (\w+) isn't protected.$
^(\w+) grabs .+ arm and begins to chew, drooling all the while\.$
